thread.section_title: Sneakerbaas Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Sneakerbaas | sneakerbaas.nl
thread.title: Jerrick lay

author: Jerrick lay
title: Jerrick lay
text: Ordered a pair of shoes from them, took them 3 days to tell me that it was sold out they offered me a refund and they told me that it would take 14 days to send my money. Communication with them was very slow. They would reply once every 24 hours. After a few days of telling me that the item was sold out, the item would appear on their website with the stock still avalible.
